Detailed Description

virtual uint32 TileMapToolkit::requestIdle (  TileMapIdleListener *  client  )  [pure virtual]
 

Requests to be notified once when the system is idle.

0 should not be returned.

Parameters:
client The client to be called.
Returns:
An id which will be used when calling the client

Referenced by TileMapGarbage< TileMap >::startIdle().

virtual uint32 TileMapToolkit::requestRepaint (  TileMapHandler *  client  )  [pure virtual]
 

Signals the platform that the map needs to be redrawn.

The platform should call client->repaint as soon as possible.

Parameters:
client The client to call when repaint is possible.

virtual uint32 TileMapToolkit::requestTimer (  TileMapTimerListener *  client,
uint32  timeoutMS
)  [pure virtual]
 

Requests a timer from the system.

When the timer expires client->timerExpired(id) should be called.

Parameters:
client Requester to be called when it is done.
timeoutMS Timeout in milliseconds.
Returns:
The id of the timer.
